summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to Project Lift-Off, increasing expenditure allowances in the 2000 budgets of the Human Services Department and the Department of Parks and Recreation by the reduction, reappropriation and transfer from the appropriation previously made for Project Lift-Off in the Department of Finance General, and increasing the expenditure allowance in the 2000 budget of the Department of Parks and Recreation by the reduction, reappropriation and transfer from appropriations previously made in the Strategic Planning Office and ratifying and confirming prior acts, all by a three-fourths vote of the City Council.
committee: Housing, Human Services, Education and Civil Rights
